Name: Thatkookooguy
AboutMe:
I studied BioInformatics (Biology + CS) at Tel-Aviv University. I became efficient in C, Java, and Perl.

I started getting into the makers community, and in the process learned to deal with microcontrollers, AutoHotkey, and other scripting languages.

After finishing my degree, I started working at Amdocs as a front-end developer. I learned web technologies like JS, CSS3,and HTML5. Also things like Backbone, RequireJS, Gzip, CSS3 Animations, responsive design.

Privately, I also learned NodeJS, AngularJS, ExpressJS, etc.

I worked at Google as a Software Engineer as part of the Live Results team.

Today, I work at RedKix
